categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Krigg was a major in the Imperial Military who joined the Order of Revan on the planet Rishi during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. A fellow Revanite, Captain Sorven, expressed concern to Krigg that the Revanites who were former members of the Republic would turn on the former Imperials.
